column6: The Skrulls are coming for Asgard and the citizens of small-town Broxton, Oklahoma! The God of Thunder must defend two cites at once! For a job this big, Thor will have to turn to one of his oldest and closest allies...Beta Ray Bill!
column8: | penciller:Doug Braithwaite | letterer:Joe Caramagna | colorist:Gabriele Dell'Otto | colorist:Paul Mounts | other:Chris Eliopoulos | writer:Matt Fraction
